Flying
You may cast Replica Parasite as a copy of another spell you’ve cast this turn, except it costs {U} in addition to its other costs.
notes:
Inspiration — Magically-enchanced/mutated creature

Mechanical Uniqueness — Spell shapeshifter

**Designer’s note: Upped from 1 mana 1/1 to 2 mana 1/3. 2 mana was chosen to make the effect more in line with something like Twincast.
